title: Prompt and professional service
text: Prompt and professional service.  Competitive pricing.  Experienced staff.

title: Brian was very helpful
text: Brian was very helpful, and the service was great. We are waiting for 3 items to be here on a deadline and hopefully that does happen.

title: Search for kitchen equipment
text: They die not have the items I needed in stock and were not expected before another 6 weeks or so. The supply chain issue so not their fault. The sales person was helpful and patient with me.

title: I recently purchased a dishwasher from…
text: I recently purchased a dishwasher from ACityDiscount, and I was very impressed with their service. The staff were knowledgeable and helped me choose a model that fit my needs and budget perfectly. The delivery process was smooth and efficient, and the installation team did a great job setting up the dishwasher and making sure everything was working properly before they left. Overall, I had a great experience with this company, and I would definitely recommend them to anyone in the market for a new dishwasher or other home appliances.

title: Placed order online and it was…
text: Placed order online and it was delivered in a timely manner. I did have questions while shopping online and logged in to chat and was never answered.

title: ACityDiscount is a great site

This is the best site for me to get things like this because I don't have time to go shopping or visit stores. They have everything I need at an affordable price.

title: very helpful,was quick delivery
text: Date of experience: June 30, 2023

title: I have not received my purchase
text: I have not received my purchase, as of yet.  I see that it was shipped USPS, so I am expecting it any day now.  I saw what appeared to be a tracking number, but the site did not have the tracking number set up as a link to track my items.  Other than that, I was very satisfied with my purchase.  Again, I have not received the package to see the condition of the items that I purchased.

title: Our buying experience was amazing but delivery was not
text: Our buying experience was amazing and the oven is perfect. The only issue we had was with the delivery : the oven was unexpectedly delivered. We had received no tracking number, and no appointment taken (despite clear instructions on the packing slip) and the +100lb package was left in full sun on the parking lot, not even close to our door. We actually received a shipment email and tracking number 1 week later...

title: Need to change the prices on the display boxes to match the computer prices
text: Buy the knifes set but was priced $150 and they charge me$175 .i ask they why and say the price was change on the computer but not on the display box so they still charge me $175 even if i show them the box was marked $150

title: Good selections of electronics…
text: Good selections of electronics available at very reasonable cost. Premium quality products. Offers amazing deals and discounts on every product which we bought from their site. Happy with the quick shipping process and attentive customer support service. Satisfied with my purchase.

title: Everything was amazing!!!
text: Date of experience: May 15, 2024

title: Acitydiscount good deals
text: Acitydiscount provides one on one consultation catered to the clients needs.You may have to call a few times but they will give you advise in the right direction. They also will provide written quotes.They also ship direct to wherever you are in the U.S so don't worry if you are not located near them.

title: From start to delivery very efficient
text: From start to delivery very efficient. Great experience.

title: All the staff I spoke with were polite…
text: All the staff I spoke with were polite and helpful when I was trying to complete the order and payment. We are a Church that utilizes out kitchen for a weekly community dinner, other meals on weekends and a Thanksgiving community meal so we needed the refrigerator ASAP. You had my order ready to deliver in less than a week.  We will be doing business with you again soon. Thank you, Barbara Smith, Willow Praise Church

title: Purchased a sliding top cooler ...
text: I did my homework before purchasing so I didn’t need a lot of help.  The shipping company seemed to have the unit a long time before scheduling delivery after I was told it was out for delivery.  I was asked to do a review 4 days before receiving the cooler.  The unit itself is well built, looks and operates good so far, and was purchased at a very fair price.

title: Shipment was fast, UPS abused the shipping carton.
text: No problems with their service as the shipment went out the next day after purchasing online. The only issue I had was with UPS abusing the microwave carton by apparently dropping it at least once and puncturing the box in three places.  It’s a miracle the microwave arrived unscathed and functions well. I would highly recommend ACD shipping department place FRAGILE stickers on these shipments to at least hope someone with UPS will take care in S&H.

title: I had a great experience buying my …
text: I had a great experience buying my convection stove eye . Salesmen told me you could use any cookware on it . On outside of box when I received it , it says you have to use certain kind of cookware . Could you clear that up for me ? I haven’t opened it yet to read about it in case I decide to return it . I certainly hope I don’t . Thank you !!!!👍👍

title: So far so good.
text: This single transaction worked out fine. I got a email when it was shipped and the item has been delivered in good shape.   I also ordered a much more expensive item from them the same day on a separate order-----(Ice Machine) but so far have not gotten a email as to whether the second order has shipped yet or not, or when it is expected to arrive.

title: TurboAir-M3 series
text: Overall I was pleased with my purchase of the turbo air refrigeratorAdam was very helpful in helping me select the right unitthe reversing of the door was quite involved-much harder than I expectednot your problem turbo airIt's been running since last Thursday(19th)We are experiencing an issue with door sensors-found out this is ajust released new model--It's having some issuesHaving to replace the control panel unitall covered by warranty

title: Good product; poor packaging. WT
text: Appears to be a good quality product. Packaging was very poor with absolutely no padding between the box and the product. Miraculously, there was only very slight damage during shipping. The seller advised me in advance to check the product before accepting; I expect the poor packaging has been a problem for them before.  Any heavy metal object should be packaged better than this before it is given to truckers and package handlers to toss around. Overall I am very pleased with the product.

title: Not bad
text: Everything was prompt and quick. My only issue is the lack of clarity on the website about returns. There needs to be a clear tab or option that details how to get into contact with the returns process. (To note, return not needed because of ACityDiscount) But everything else was as expected and delivered correctly the first time.

title: This store surprized by the assortment of furniture here.
text: In my opinion, it's very important for human to find the time in their tight schedule in order to dedicate it to household chores. That's why I once have decided to start finding a proper store to decorate my room with new stuff and replace the old furniture with a new one. This store surprized by the assortment of furniture here. You can easily find the most suitable option of couch for example and you won't actually spend too much time on it. This is the main feature, that everything goes very fast here. Customer support is on a solid level, mostly because they are very responsive and I guess quite responsible.

title: Overall very good service and quick to…
text: Overall very good service and quick to answers questions. I also appreciated the email confirming the power supply thing.The only point of improvement I would add to that is featuring pictures of the plug. While we had a three phase set up with 50 amps the plug was slightly different which delayed us a bit.

title: Pros (and cons I think I can live with)
text: I didn't expect the shipment to arrive so quickly.  The price was 2/3 of what I would have paid to Vitamix for this particular blender carafe.  I only wish that I had received the exact model shown on the online page, which had the original rubber ergonomic handle--as opposed to this thin plastic one; also, the lid jiggles around as if it will fall off when I'm blending.  The original lid has a special lip that secures the seal.  I will see if my original lid will fit the new carafe.

title: Quick Fix for Old Chairs
text: The seats were perfect for replacing our two old chairs and they arrived very quickly.  I would give 5 stars, but one seat has a tiny vertical stress tear (1 inch) in the very front.  We don't care enough to send it back, but maybe it snuck past quality control.  Or perhaps it tore during shipment?

title: I would give 5 stars
text: I would give 5 stars, except for the delivery information.  One appliance was coming by Fedex and because I set it to go to my business address, there is no way to get notified as to when it might arrive. The only information I was given is that it could arrive between 8:00am & 8:00 pm.  For the other, the tracking number wasn’t identified, on the invoice, and I had to contact the shipping company to get an idea as to when it would arrive. Being that I am in a rural area, deliveries take longer than usual.  Still waiting on the oven to arrive.

title: Ice machine arrived with a dent in the…
text: Ice machine arrived with a dent in the side. Shipping box wasn't damaged, so it was boxed that way from the manufacturer. Wasn't a big deal for me as the machine is under my island and the dent isn't in view. Everything about the purchase went smooth and item arrived promptly.

title: Excellent customer support service
text: Excellent customer support service provided by ACityDiscount. Bought one Electric 6 Burner Restaurant Range with Standard oven which can be used for commercial as well as house purpose. Liked the quality of the product very much.

title: Ice Maker Scotsman 65lb Undercounter
text: First, I paid $50 to have it brought into the house.  That did not occur.Second, the condenser is loud.  Is that common with this model.  I did not have this issue with the previous ice maker.  Any idea why it is so loud???

title: The experience in placing and receiving …
text: The experience in placing and receiving my order was very easy and I received what I ordered in a timely manner. There was no shipping damage to the equipment which means that it was packaged well and the shipping company that delivered it took care in handling it.

title: The ice machine I ordered took a little …
text: The ice machine I ordered took a little longer to get to me than originally discussed but my salesman, Ned followed up as best he could, I think the issue was with whom the distributor was for this particular machine. Good prices and good communication.

title: I am very satisfied with the speed of …
text: I am very satisfied with the speed of the delivery, but the driver failed to give me a call even though it was stated on the slip. I was called from another site, by the time I arrive in 20min, the driver was gone after dropping off the equipment.

title: Normally would be five stars
text: Normally would be five stars.  Product and shipping are still good quality and fast.  Packaging this time was in a much larger box, had some concern about product integrity, but appears to be in good shape.

title: The thermostat Control is in the way of…
text: The thermostat Control is in the way of installing the legs on Deep fryer have to remove thermostat control in order to secure them too unit ...... Have not used fryers yet we'll get back with you on how they function at a later date.

title: Delivery from purchase to front door…
text: Delivery from purchase to front door was wonderful. However the product itself is in question. The cooler doesnt seem to be cold enough and it's been on for 3 days now. Gonna give a little more time and see what happens.

title: The product ordered is as advertised…
text: The product ordered is as advertised and was delivered in a timely manner. The shipping box was damaged and noted as such by the USPS and the item was not damaged. However, the shipping charge was excessive.

title: drain pan
text: The item was good, only problem in shipping, ups had to have me sign for the package, I missed them 3 times and had to drive 20 miles to pick it up at the ups hub. Don"t know why  I had to sign for a 20 dollar item.

title: quality products....
text: Date of experience: April 21, 2022

title: Update on ACity's response
text: Well, ACity finally came through.  They covered the service call and gave a little extra for the inconvenience.  They did have to fight with the manufacturer like I did but guess they had more leverage and won out.  Got the check today.  Bad thing is, the other unit I bought from them (same manufacturer) now went down. Must be something about getting close to end of warranty. They said it should be no problem reimbursing me this time as they straightened things out with the manufacturer. I would have gone to 5 stars but with all the initial problems, no call backs etc I went with 4 due to their fighting for me with the manufacturer.  I'd buy from them again but will ask more questions also. Just good business practices.

title: Individual pieces
text: They arrived before the expected date and were exactly what was needed.  Thank you for your assistance.  I liked that I could buy them as individual pieces instead of packs of 12.

title: Third appliance purchased from …
text: Third appliance purchased from ACityDiscount and everything has been 5 star worthy until this last delivery (first time fedex was the carrier). I had requested a call be made before delivery and provided a cell phone plus backup landline. After never getting a call on either and seeing the status change from delivery on Thursday to pending, I decided to call fedex. After a 20 minutes of transferring to different departments I was told that someone did call and when I disputed this was promptly hung up on. I went and got phone records from my cell provider after this, and those proved to me there never was a call. Back to calling fedex and twenty more minutes of shuffling around and I get a supervisor and the best they can do is 5 days later even though the shipping center where the item is is within 15 miles of the destination. The shipping portion of this particular order was incredibly frustrating, and completely unlike the previous orders from AcityDiscount.com. Removing fedex from the equation would bring this rating back up to 5 stars

title: This message is to the freight company you used for my delivery...
text: Every person I talked to was very helpful and pleasant to deal with.  Your people are customer service oriented.  The one think I didn't liked is that the freight company you used from GA to RI, never bothered to give you the delivery date of my purchase.  I actually called to cancel the order and was put on hold, then the sales rep told me that the item was already in transit.  Had I known, I could've pass that info along to my client who was nervous about not having his item on time.  I also spent some time looking for an alternative.  I think the freight company you hired could have done a better job.  I thought of letting you know to see if you'll pass my message along to them.  Maybe they need some feedback.  Thank you!

title: Fast shipper

title: Excellent..But
text: Excellent. Would rate five stars if the product would have been packed with more protection. The legs came loose and dented the product in transit. Not major enough damage to endure the hassle of refusal, return and replacement, but nevertheless a disappointment. Repairable damage. Happy with the product and the buying experience otherwise, especially followup and perceived concern about the buying experience.

title: These folks did everything they could to work with me to make sure I was happy with my order!!
text: We are a Wilderness Club that is VERY active in our community...always hosting charitable events for wildlife organizations, churches, terminally ill children, and veterans...so, having the right equipment to serve the number of people we do is very important.  The folks at ACityDiscount were so willing to help out and make sure we got exactly what we needed in a timely manner!!!  We will feed over 500 people in 3 days next week for a veteran's event and our new range/oven will be here today!!!  Can't ask for better people to work with!!  Thanks so much for all you guys do!!

title: Everything was great with one exception.
text: Variety of product and customer service was fantastic. My only issue is process. I really do not like having to fill out a form to buy things. I would have saved myself about 10 minutes if that step were able to be avoided. Also later in the day I received two emails. One told me my order was ready, about 15 minutes later I got another telling me I had picked up my order, meanwhile I had been gone with order in hand for about an hour and a half. This seems like an inefficient way of doing things that is wasting your time, probably much more than the ten minutes it wasted of mine. Again, really liked your store and everyone was super friendly and helpful, I just think you might want to revisit your process.

title: The product seems OK but the FedEx delivery was not
text: My complaint is with FedEx delivery and interface to customers. I waited at home on the day of the scheduled delivery but no delivery was attempted. At ten tht night the FedEx website indicated that the addressee was no available to accept the delivery. I tried contacting the FedEx customer service and had a bad experience with their on-line chat forum with an agent with poor English mastery and apparently no more information than what appeared on the website. The next day was much like the first except that the tracking feature indicated that the package would be returned to Norcross because no one was available to receive it. I drilled down into the FedEx website and found a phone number for customer service. I gave them my phone number for the driver to call if he could not fine my house. The following day the package was delivered without incident. The driver denied all knowledge of previous failed attempts at delivery. In short, I had to wait at home for 3 days before the delivery was made and was quite frustrated with the FedEx website customer interface.

title: fast service
text: The Migali refrigerator I purchased shipped the same day it was ordered, and in my city ready for pickup the next day. I am using it in our remodeled and enlarged kitchen.    There was a little problem getting warranty registered.  The warranty statement did not indicate that warranty did not apply for residential use, while other brands specifically state no warranty for residential use.  By the way, the Migali web site does not state this either, in fact, the instruction book that came with the unit has the warranty statement.  It does not indicate no residential use.  Management at Migali had to OK warranty.  We really like the huge refrigerator.

Otherwise everything was great.  Thank you.

title: Good Business to do Business with
text: I was very pleased with the online process that ACityDiscount has set up on their site. You know exactly what is going on throughout the purchasing process. I give them 5 stars for this.With that being said, I was kind of upset at the way it was packaged. The unit was just set on the bottom of a very well constructed box with bubble wrap all around it. There was however, no protection whatsoever on the bottom. The bubble wrap could have been put to better use by at least wrapping the unit in bubble wrap and not just laying it on top of the unit itself. The only damage to the unit itself was that the clips that were on the bottom got stretched out a bit. When I get ready to use the unit, I will see if I can fix it.Other then that, it was a pleasurable experience with them and yes, I will buy from them again, but this time I will call in my order and give instructions as to how to pack a box. LOL

title: Great product/Great Price/Horrid Delivery service
text: A City Discount sold us an excellent refrigerated until at a great price!  Shipping was very quick!  The delivery agent they used was EXTREMELY rude AND damaged our door by taking large chunks out of the wood while he complained about bringing the refrigerated unit inside our establishment.  Basically he wanted to leave the item outside and let my friend and I (two women) to fend for ourselves on how to bring the unit inside out of the elements.  Mind you, the item was on a dolly and he could just have easily wheeled it (gently through the door) and about 20 feet with ease.  Oh and I paid $50 extra  for him to lower it off of his truck and put it in our parking lot - that was ridiculous as well.  I suggest using a different shipping company A City Discount if you want to keep customers coming back for more items because that is the one and only thing that would prevent me from buying from you again.

text: I was desperate to get a new oven before my next catering - ACity had it in stock and I ordered it from them.  My first email query was answered right away but followup emails were not answered.  So, I called.  Initially, I was dissapointed in that experience.  The phone rep had a lot of difficulty getting the info right and I had to correct it a few times.  I didn't have a lot of faith that things were going to go well.  HOWEVER, I was wrong.  The oven was shipped in record time, everything was correct, and I will receive it before my deadline... at least, I'm supposed to.  I would recommend.

I don't know if it was a sale on that particular idem from the store or from the manufacturing of the idem.😐 But all in all was a good price any way😉. title: Good Customer Service
text: After e-mailing ACityDiscount to ensure that the 3 VITA-MIX containers that I wanted to purchase would work on My blenders, I purchased them from ACityDiscount through AMAZON.com.  The containers fit the blender base, but would not allow the noise reducing cover to close, because the 64 oz containers were to tall. I would have been out of luck, but I shipped them back for a refund minus the shipping and handling charges. I then purchased Advanced XP Blades for my blender containers from ACityDiscount. Their Customer Service Personnel are professionals. Thanks ACity Discount.

title: Very Helpful
text: A City Discount has good variety and is very helpful.

title: Good Price, Fast Shipping !
text: Easy doing business with them.  I had to call customer service before my I placed my order and they were friendly and helpful.  I got a good price on my product and they shipped fast.

title: A (budding) restauranteur's dream come true.
text: What I love about this store is the back room, warehouse style with unbelievable finds. Odds and ends at unbeatable prices for your restaurant (or home) if you're big on entertaining...I particularly enjoy the "surprise" 50% off at check out.

title: Good quality, good price and good delivery
text: Excellent quality with good pricing

title: Excellent service
text: Had some hiccups during checkout, but after calling direct the people on the phone were very friendly and helpful. Although my knife arrived safely, it could have been better packed.

title: People their are great and fun!
text: Overall customer service is good. I feel this is a good resource in the food industry.

title: One stop shop
text: You can find almost everything you would need for your restaurant needs as far as equipment. The only complaint is the prices aren't as competitive as other venders in the area. Other than the prices, customer service is great. They really try to help you find everything you might be looking for.

title: So far everything's Peachy!
text: Great service, best price and (speedy) delivery included.  I just installed my ice maker - so far all is good!

title: Was very patient with me
text: I had difficulty completing my purchase because my bank had placed a security hold on my account due to recent out of town purchases I made while visiting a friend in another city. They always gave a number to call along with a name to reference. Eventually the problem was taken care of. I will never forget the patience that was given. Thumbs up!!!

title: I was kept informed all the way from purchase to delivery
text: The only issue we had was when I was phoned to tell me that there would be an additional charge to deliver to my home rather than a business because they would need a lift truck which did not make any sense since they would need a lift truck to deliver to my business location. The customer service rep inquired with management to waive the fee since I said I would just purchase the product locally then, they waived the fee and I would do business with ACity again. When you advertise free shipping on ebay it needs to be free(we all know it is built into the price anyway).

title: Very good.
text: They have always been good

title: Excellent Teams they deliver
text: First time dealing this company has been and excellent experience. And I don't think I have any hang ups using them again.

title: good stuff !!
text: ordered a commercial stove and griddle. was very pleased at the price and attention given to me through the process. good experience.

title: Nice one stop shopping for restaurant setup
text: Has everything you need to start a restaurant or keep it going.  Friendly and helpful staff that's not always trying to sell.  Very competive prices .

title: Like my purchase
text: Works well with no complaints.

title: Great price. Welding lines prominent
text: I would probably order from here again, I know I'm a bit picky, so the welding lines stand out to me, but over all a fantastic bargain for the item.

title: Overall a good place for restaurant supplies.
text: Easy to find the items I need for my restaurant.

title: Great service and nice location
text: People are very helpful and easy to work with! Will definitely use them again!

title: good prices on new items
text: helpful staff, esp the woman that sits at the front desk

title: One stop shop for all needs and budgets
text: A well thought out concept for the Atlanta area at an economical and outstanding customer service

title: Very Clean! Miss Haynes All-Pro
text: Shop here First!

title: Lovely environment
text: Friendly customer service

title: Good service and friendly customer service staff
text: Bought several things here over the past and have been satisfied every time.  The customer service staff stands out as professional and very helpful.

title: 3rd Try Contac Was Successful
text: When my husband and I initially went into the store we were greeted and offered assistance.  I expressed an interest in a smoker and the salesperson seemed interested in assisting me.  He even told me of the current sale that was being offered by the manufacturer.  Since this item was going to be a Christmas present for my husband, I told him that I would get back with him the following day. At that point I found that the service was lacking.  The next day I placed two (2) telephone messages for the salesperson without a response.  On the second day from the initial visit to the store, I sent two emails directly to the salesperson; again without a response. I called and was left on hold for over ten (10) minutes.  Finally, I called again and when answered by another salesperson,  I went forward with the order with the new salesperson answering the telephone. Once I explained to him my interest in purchasing the item, the order and preliminary purchase of the item went smoothly.  The initial salesperson called me and said he tried to contact me, however I did not get his voice message. We both agreed to a miscommunication situation.

title: reasonable n affordable and good customer service
text: Recomended to anybody and find anything you could think of for your restaurant...

title: great alternative to Atlanta fixture!
text: terrific customer service competitive pricing knowledgeable staff good showroom quality used equipment

title: Busy place..
text: Great values... order desk was busy with customers but knowledgeable and willing to help  .. paid with cash .. obviously their system for accepting cash has recently changed which caused delays in making change ..

title: I'll order from then again
text: Easy to order, easy to track. Shipped and called when they say they would. 1 flaw tho, driver drops item off and leaves. Other drivers have help w/ getting an item into the store and not leave it on the side walk. Other then that, good experience.

title: Beats all prices & very nice sales person Robert was joy
text: I wasn't to impressed with Roberts boss but I sure thought Robert my sales person was the best. He even took the time to find me the best cooler in the wherehouse. I bought a dishwasher from him because I like him so. Much and a convection oven from him also very nice.

title: A good experience with a good company
text: They worked with me to stay in my budget while getting me what I needed.

title: great product, great service
text: Buy from this place.

title: Stand up Customer Service and Follow through
text: I'm opening a small place in Chicago and found ACity view a google search. I was very happy with the equipment I found and immediatly began to put it in my shopping cart. When I went to check out, things got a little hairy and I had to call in. It seems even though I opened an account, "booked" all the equipment to buy, the system wouldn't le me. The guy helped me out - and of course he had to go through and re-do everything I just spent an hour doing online. It was a little frustrating, but the guy was great and was able to rebuild it. I highly recommend if you want to buy something, look at it online then call. They get 4 stars for great customer service and line of product. They'd have 5 if they're online purchasing system was functional.

title: Good customer Service!
text: They always have the lowest prices, out of the other stores.

title: Cudos to Krista
text: Krista Haynes was an excellent representative for your store as she both assisted us in getting the equipment we needed as well as steered us to resources in the community to resources that were not available in your store.

title: knowledgeable sales staff and prompt service!
text: I was surprised with their selection of products and their low prices.

title: Great service....this is my second time buy items from them.
text: Bought a Blendtec from them price was good plus free shipping

title: Large selection of new and used equipment
text: They have a large showroom north of Atlanta full of new and used equipment.

title: Good substitiute recommendation
text: After installation of a new oven, I was lef with an 18"w space between the fryers and new new oven under the fire suppression canopy. Ideally, I felt that space should be filled by ss cabinet that could house the griddle accessories and at the same time provide some table top work area for the fryers and the overn.  Local dealers and AtCity could find no such "animal", but AtCity was willing to have one made. But as we worked through the cost benefit analysis together, it became apparent that a standard 18'w ss tabel with bottom shelf and casters would be the most cost effective solution. My outfitting was complete within a week after order.  Thanks again AtCity.

title: Great service
text: Was very pleased with the product and the timely manner in which it was delivered. Also, the prices are very reasonable for the items we purchased.

title: High quality products
text: You can find supplies that you can't find locally. And good quality.

title: Although I recieved an order  filled incorrectly  it was quickly refilled and sent  with genuine concern.
text: I had a problem with an order that was filled incorrectly by the manufacturer. Both A City Discount and the manufacture corrected the error within the day I received the shipment . I highly recommend both companies in their genuine concern and prompt action. Their integrity is trustworthy.

title: Website was user freindly. Quick Service. Thank you.
text: I was very please with the website.  It was comprehensive and user friendly.  If we have further needs for our Culinary Arts program, I will be sure to check A City Discount again.  Our merchandise arrived quickly.  Only one complaint, I stated on the order that i wanted someone to contact us. I never received that call to prepare our Plant Operations staff to be ready at unload.  Other than that, we are pleased customers.

title: Used item seems to be in great condition, Shipping was wonderfully fast.
text: I purchased a used ice machine from ACityDiscount (Scotsman 525Ib Cube Style Air Cooled Ice Machine w Bin). The item was received in very good condition and in short order shipping via Fedex Freight. The removal of the packaging revealed the ice machine head to be visually in great condition and the bin had very few cosmetic signs of wear. The interior of the ice bin held no off putting odor for which I had concern. Our  ref. technician gave it a visual inspection and found nothing to be questionable. However, even though ACD found it to be in working order, we have yet to employ it for ice making. If it produces ice as well as it looks, we will be very be happy with our purchase and will do business with ACD in the future. Ned W. Roush IIMoon & Raven Public HouseWilliamsport, Pa.p.s. I only gave it four stars because we haven't connected it to make ice yet. If it is found to be in great working order, five stars will be my upgraded rating.

title: Great Prices! Easy to Order...Quick Shipping
text: I found ACityDiscount to be one of the best value online sources for work tables and equipment stands. The website is easy to navigate, easy to see the specs on the items I want to buy. I got spec sheets and all the info easily on the ad pages. The order process was easy and my items were shipped very fast. I would give 5 stars, except that one of my items arrived with dings, dents and scratches which were not due to shipping. The boxes were in perfect condition, but the equipment stand inside was dinged up and scratched as if it had been a floor model or second. I don't care enough to send it back. It still functions fine, but I would have liked to have known this before purchase. Otherwise, great experience!

title: Not  bad.
text: I've made several purchases from here now and am usually pleased with the price and the product or I wouldn't purchase from them again. Every experience has been a good one. The only difficulty that  I've had this time has been with getting emails that I was told I would get. I still haven't gotten a tracking number for this last purchase. Those aren't any big problems though. I will definitely be back. Don

title: great!!
text: great service!!

title: Great site for One Stop Shopping
text: I needed two new fryers in my Bar so I searched the sites and found ACD to be very competitive and better priced in a lot of instances. I bought a two Imperial Fryers to go with my used Imperial and got rid of some old Vulcans.  My Cooks love them and it was actually a moral booster to get the new Imperials installed. They work great, esp under loads on our Friday Night Fish Fry's.     The Rep on the phone was a bit agitated with me because I couldn't remember which Rep. I had talked to previously about the fryers, but he chilled out when I asked to speak to a different Rep. LOL     I would order from them again, they shipped pretty quick out of GA.  I ordered on Mon. and the fryers showed up in N. Mich Thurs. morning.  The Imperial IFS 75 Deep Fat/Fish fryer is the whip for Friday night fish frys. I can do 12 pieces of Cod at a time in the 18x18 cook area. Time is Money.

title: Fantastic!
text: I purchased a 40 lbs gas fryer at the beginning of February 2013.  I was charged $595.00.  When I received the item the price tag was marked $570.00.  I went back to the store on several occasions and found out that the price of the gas fryer was indeed less than $595.00 in the store.  I communicated my concerns to the staff at A City Discount because the price was reduced and it was within a two week time frame. After addressing my concerns to the Customer Service Department, I was offered a price modification on the fryer. I am pleased with the customer service.

title: Received product packaged well for safe transport and delivery.
text: ACityDiscount was very easy to work with, and packaged my product well to ensure safe transport. The delivery took longer than what was showing on tracking, but that was due to the transport company, not ACityDiscount.
